derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: French, literally 'a kind' (see gender)

entry.tran: （文学、绘画、音乐、电影等艺术作品的）体裁，类型
entry.def: A genre is a particular type of literature, painting, music, film, or other art form which people consider as a class because it has special characteristics.

example.ex: ...his love of films and novels in the horror genre.
example.tran: 他对恐怖电影和恐怖小说的热衷

means.word_mean: 1. a kind of literary or artistic work
2. a style of expressing yourself in writing
4. a class of art (or artistic endeavor) having a characteristic form or technique
